exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

In environment l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= r y : nat H : forall y : nat, CodeNat y -> l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ y = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r) c : CodeNat ?M1554 Unable to unify "l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ ?M1554 = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code ?M1554 /\\ Code z /\\ ?M1554 + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ ?M1554 + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r)" with "l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ y = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 p0 p1 p2 r1 : nat, p0 = r /\\ r1 + 1 = p0 /\\ p1 = power (1 + l) 2 /\\ p2 = power p1 p0 /\\ seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * p2 = z * v ⇣ (r1 * v1) /\\ y + v1 + p0 * p0 = z + p2)".

In environment l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= r y : nat H : CodeNat y H0 : forall y : nat, CodeNat y -> l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ y = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r) Unable to unify "l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ ?M1559 = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code ?M1559 /\\ Code z /\\ ?M1559 + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ ?M1559 + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r)" with "1 <= l".

exceptions.exn: The reference z was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet * is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros. split. - split. + apply IncSeq_dio_priv. auto. + right. split. * apply IncSeq_dio_priv. auto. * exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try auto. - intros [H1 [H2 H3]]. apply IncSeq_dio_priv. split; try auto. destruct H1 as [-> | [H4 H5]]. + left. auto. + right. split; try auto. exists z, v, v1. repeat split; try auto. exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try auto.
